bibl.title: Three Applications from Oxyrhynchus.
bibl.note: Τόμος containing records of procedures originating in the office of the archidicastes and resulting in his instruction to the Nome officials. Oxyrhynchus, 1 July 127 A.D. - 1. Fr. I, col. I; XV, col. I. An application to the strategus of Heracleopolite. - 2. Frr. I, col. II; II-XI; XV, col. II; XVII-XXI. An application concerning a loan of money. - 3. Frr. XII-XIV; XVI. An application to the strategus of Heracleopolite.

bibl.title: Proceedings of the XIXth International Congress of Papyrology. I

bibl.seg: HANAFI Alia, Three Applications from Oxyrhynchus.
Proceedings of the XIXth International Congress of Papyrology. I (Cairo, 1992) pp. 557-580.
